longBusinessSummary: Gr. Sarantis S.A., together with its subsidiaries, produces and trades cosmetics, household, and parapharmaceutical products. It operates through six segments: Beauty/Skin/Sun Care, Personal Care, Home Care, Private Label (Polipak), Strategic Partnerships, and Other Sales. The company provides personal care products, including baby care, body wash, baby wash, grooming, hair care, hair styling, hand wash, oral care, personal hygiene, shaving, skin care, and sun care products, as well as deodorants and fragrances; and home care products, such as dishwashing, drainer care, food packaging, insect control, concentrated fabric softeners, and shoe care products, as well as bathroom cleaners, cleaning tools, septic tank activators, and garbage bags. It also offers health care products comprising food supplements, health and self-care products, and skin care products; cosmetics, including candles, make up, treatment, and home and other fragrances products; and professional products, such as cleaning tools, detergents, and food and other packaging products. The company offers its products through hypermarkets, supermarkets, groceries, beauty shops, and pharmacies. It operates in Greece, Poland, Romania, Bulgaria, Bosnia-Herzegovina, Slovenia, Serbia, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Hungary, North Macedonia, Bosnia, and Ukraine. The company was founded in 1930 and is headquartered in Athens, Greece.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Evangelos A. Siarlis
